text.*:
Entertainment hall of fame in Almería
Almeria Walk of Fame
Omar Sharif showing the star
Established 2012
Location Almería
Type Entertainment hall of fame

Almeria Walk of Fame (Paseo de la fama de Almería in Spanish) is the Walk of Fame located in Almeria, Spain, similar to Hollywood Walk of Fame.[1]

Celebrities[edit]

Eduardo Fajardo's star.

The celebrities who have his own star are:

  • Eduardo Fajardo, who receives the star in April 11, 2012 due to his intervention in 7th Cavalry and Django.[2]
  • Omar Sharif receives his star in December 4, 2012 due to his intervention in Lawrence of Arabia[3]
  • Ridley Scott had programmed to receive his star in November 13, 2013 due to his intervention in Exodus: Gods and Kings, but it is delayed.[4]
  • American actor Christian Bale rejected his star because of he is focus on his own work.[5] However, Ridley Scott received his star.[6]
  • Denis O'Dell received his star in December 3, 2013 due to his intervention in How I Won the War.[7]
  • Max von Sydow received his star in December 5, 2013 due to his intervention March or Die.[8]
  • Arnold Schwarzenegger received his star in October 29, 2014 due to his intervention in Conan the Barbarian,[9] as well as receiving Almería Tierra de Cine prix.[10]
  • Actor and director Terry Gilliam received his star in December 3, 2014 during the XIII Festival Internacional de Cortometrajes Almería en Corto.[11]
  • Patrick Wayne received his star in December 1, 2015 due to his intervention in The Deserter, Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger y Rustlers' Rhapsody.[12]
  • Ángela Molina received his star in December 6, 2015 due to his intervention in Las cosas del querer, L'homme qui a perdu son ombre y One of the Hollywood Ten.[13]
  • Catherine Deneuve received his star in November 13, 2016 due to his intervention in March or Die.[14]
  • Spanish actor José Coronado, due to the celebration of the XV Festival Internacional de Almería, he received the star in November 19, 2016,[15] as well as receiving the Almería Tierra de Cine prix.[16][17]
  • American actor Aaron Paul showed affection to the city,[18] and he has confirmed which he will receive the star due to his intervention in Exodus: Gods and Kings[19] in 2014 when he came back to promote the film.[20]
  • Ayuntamiento de Almería is working in order to Clint Eastwood received this honour when he came back to the city.[21]
  • When Brian De Palma finished the filming of Domino, he received a miniature of the star which will be shown soon.[22]
  • Danish actor Nikolaj Coster-Waldau will receive the star soon for participated in Brian De Palma's film.[23][24]
  • Italian actress Sophia Loren received the star on 16 November 2017 due to his intervention in Bianco, rosso e....[25][26][27] She received the Almería Tierra de Cine award.[28]
  • Spanish director Álex de la Iglesia received the star on 17 November 2017.[29][30][31]

See also[edit]

  • List of halls and walks of fame
